page.title: 08HOLE IN THE WALL.
page.content:
On{Yeldersley Lane}is the{Hole In The {Wall.}It used to be a{Toll House}.In main arch there are blocked up windows where they paid their tax to get to {Bradley Park.}The roof in the arch has been made from wattle and daub with strips of wood across.On either side of the building are the hooks where the gates used to be hung,they opened them when the people paid.On the outside of the building are small windows which are partly made of lead.The semi detached houses are now private dwellings.
{ SIMON MOORE. {
